channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Lightroom Classic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Lightroom Classic

item.title: CVE-2021-40776|2024-08-04T02:51:07.006Z -- adobe -- lightroom%20classic
item.description: Adobe Lightroom Classic 10.3 (and earlier) are affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability in the Offline Lightroom Classic installer. An authenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges. User interaction is required before product installation to abuse this vulnerability.
